item.title: 2019 Reading List
item.description: Here are some of the highlights from my 2019 reading: The Infinite Game, by Simon Sinek You have to have an “infinite mindset” to build the best companies. Short-term focus will never build a resilient and inspiring company. I love this book and would recommend it to anyone helping build a growing business. More Info Accelerate, by Nicole Forsgren, Jez Humble, and Gene Kim This came out in 2018, but it had a big enough impact I wanted to make sure to put it down on the this first list.
